verses.verse: Then Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Build <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> for me here, <S%H2088><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> for me here. <S%H2088><s%>"

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had spoken, <S%H1696><s%> and Balak <S%H1111><s%> and Balaam <S%H1109><s%> offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bull <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on each altar. <S%H4196><s%>

Then Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Stand <S%H3320><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> and I will go; <S%H1980><s%> perhaps <S%H194><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H7136><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> me, and whatever <S%H4100><s%> <S%H1697><s%> He shows <S%H7200><s%> me I will tell <S%H5046><s%> you." So he went <S%H1980><s%> to a bare <S%H8205><s%> hill. <S%H8205><s%>

Now God <S%H430><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to Him, "I have set <S%H6186><s%> up the seven <S%H7651><s%> altars, <S%H4196><s%> and I have offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bull <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on each altar. <S%H4196><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in Balaam's mouth <S%H6310><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Return <S%H7725><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> thus. <S%H3541><s%>"

So he returned <S%H7725><s%> to him, and behold, <S%H2009><s%> he was standing <S%H5324><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> his burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> he and all <S%H3605><s%> the leaders <S%H8269><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

And he took <S%H5375><s%> up his discourse <S%H4912><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "From Aram <S%H6307><s%> Balak <S%H1111><s%> has brought <S%H5148><s%> me, Moab's king <S%H4428><s%> from the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of the East, <S%H6924><s%> 'Come <S%H1980><s%> curse <S%H779><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for me, And come, <S%H1980><s%> denounce <S%H2194><s%> Israel! <S%H3478><s%>'

"How <S%H4100><s%> shall I curse, <S%H6895><s%> whom God <S%H410><s%> has not cursed <S%H6895><s%>? And how <S%H4100><s%> can I denounce, <S%H2194><s%> whom the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not denounced <S%H2194><s%>?

"As I see <S%H7200><s%> him from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the rocks, <S%H6697><s%> And I look <S%H7789><s%> at him from the hills; <S%H1389><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> [who] dwells <S%H7931><s%> apart, <S%H910><s%> And shall not be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

"Who <S%H4310><s%> can count <S%H4487><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Or number <S%H4557><s%> the fourth <S%H7255><s%> part <S%H7255><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? Let me die <S%H4191><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the upright, <S%H3477><s%> And let my end <S%H319><s%> be like <S%H3644><s%> his!"

Then Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> have you done <S%H6213><s%> to me? I took <S%H3947><s%> you to curse <S%H6895><s%> my enemies, <S%H340><s%> but behold, <S%H2009><s%> you have actually <S%H1288><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them!"

And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Must I not be careful <S%H8104><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> puts <S%H7760><s%> in my mouth <S%H6310><s%>?"

Then Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Please <S%H4994><s%> come <S%H1980><s%> with me to another <S%H312><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> from where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you may see <S%H7200><s%> them, although you will only <S%H657><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the extreme <S%H7097><s%> end <S%H7097><s%> of them, and will not see <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them; and curse <S%H6895><s%> them for me from there. <S%H8033><s%>"

So he took <S%H3947><s%> him to the field <S%H7704><s%> of Zophim, <S%H6839><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah, <S%H6449><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> a bull <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on [each] altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Stand <S%H3320><s%> here <S%H3541><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> while I myself <S%H595><s%> meet <S%H7136><s%> [the] [Lord] yonder. <S%H3541><s%>"

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth <S%H6310><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Return <S%H7725><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall speak. <S%H1696><s%>"

And he came <S%H935><s%> to him, and behold, <S%H2009><s%> he was standing <S%H5324><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> his burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> and the leaders <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> with him. And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "What <S%H4100><s%> has the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoken <S%H1696><s%>?"

Then he took <S%H5375><s%> up his discourse <S%H4912><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Arise, <S%H6965><s%> O Balak, <S%H1111><s%> and hear; <S%H8085><s%> Give <S%H238><s%> ear <S%H238><s%> to me, O son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor! <S%H6834><s%>

"God <S%H410><s%> is not a man, <S%H376><s%> that He should lie, <S%H3576><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> that He should repent; <S%H5162><s%> Has He said, <S%H559><s%> and will He not do <S%H6213><s%> it? Or has He spoken, <S%H1696><s%> and will He not make <S%H6965><s%> it good <S%H6965><s%>?
"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have received <S%H3947><s%> [a command] to bless; <S%H1288><s%> When He has blessed, <S%H1288><s%> then I cannot <S%H3808><s%> revoke <S%H7725><s%> it.

"He has not observed <S%H5027><s%> misfortune <S%H205><s%> in Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> has He seen <S%H7200><s%> trouble <S%H5999><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> his God <S%H430><s%> is with him, And the shout <S%H8643><s%> of a king <S%H4428><s%> is among them.
"God <S%H410><s%> brings <S%H3318><s%> them out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> He is for them like the horns <S%H8443><s%> of the wild <S%H7214><s%> ox. <S%H7214><s%>

"For there is no <S%H3808><s%> omen <S%H5173><s%> against Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> is there any divination <S%H7081><s%> against Israel; <S%H3478><s%> At the proper time <S%H6256><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> to Jacob <S%H3290><s%> And to Israel, <S%H3478><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> God <S%H410><s%> has done. <S%H6466><s%>

"Behold, <S%H2005><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> rises <S%H6965><s%> like a lioness, <S%H3833><s%> And as a lion <S%H738><s%> it lifts <S%H5375><s%> itself; It shall not lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> it devours <S%H398><s%> the prey, <S%H2964><s%> And drinks <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain. <S%H2491><s%>"
Then Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> "Do not curse <S%H6895><s%> them at all <S%H6895><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> them at all! <S%H1288><s%>"

But Balaam <S%H1109><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Did I not tell <S%H1696><s%> you, 'Whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> speaks, <S%H1696><s%> that I must do <S%H6213><s%>'?"

Then Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> come, <S%H1980><s%> I will take <S%H3947><s%> you to another <S%H312><s%> place; <S%H4725><s%> perhaps <S%H194><s%> it will be agreeable <S%H3474><s%> with God <S%H430><s%> that you curse <S%H6895><s%> them for me from there. <S%H8033><s%>"
So Balak <S%H1111><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%> which overlooks <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H8259><s%> the wasteland. <S%H3452><s%>

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Balak, <S%H1111><s%> "Build <S%H1129><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> for me here <S%H2088><s%> and prepare <S%H3559><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> for me here. <S%H2088><s%>"

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had said, <S%H559><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> up a bull <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on [each] altar. <S%H4196><s%>
